txt.en: You are just in time, as I have knocked my final arrow!
Excellent! My quiver is almost empty!

The centre watch-tower is besieged by enemies crossing the trench to scale the dike. The scouts above the watch-tower are in grave danger. Should the tower become razed, a great asset in defending the dike will be lost.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Partial</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minor Point Gain</rgb>
* Every scout remaining in the watch-tower upon defeating each wave

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
* A watch-tower becomes structurally damaged
* A Rohirrim scout becomes defeated

The watch-towers upon Helm's Dike grant a favourable position for the Rohirrim. Scouts will mark the numbers of the coming force and fire their arrows upon them as they approach. The enemy will make every effort to take away the advantage the towers provide, you must protect the towers and the archers who fight to defend them.
Gamling has gone too long without more arrows
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not let the enemy raze the tower.</rgb>
Do not let the towers become razed ([placeholder]/2)
Defeat waves of enemies assaulting the centre watch-tower  ([placeholder]/6)
The Archer Commander has gone too long without arrows
A munitions cache has been destroyed
